message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay that price for the excellent value you mentioned.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While I understand your offer, the value of this product is considerably higher. How about we meet in the middle at $170?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $140? I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
